channel.title: How do I setup my server to be online for all?
channel.description: I currently have a sever that is working from my local machine, but I want it to run online for all. I have no-ip setup and running, but what do I have to change in my server and/or client to make it accessible for anyone from the web? I have opened my ports in my router already, so I just need to fix the server. Thanks

item.title: How do I setup my server to be online for all?
item.dc:creator: @I_Heart_Codes I Heart Codes
item.description:
@I_Heart_Codes wrote:

you need to change the ip in the client.java files to ur no-ip open the client.java and search 127.0.0.1

Read full topic
